snippet: An ex-aide to Imelda Marcos, former first lady of the Philippines, is being tried for conspiring to sell valuable paintings that were bought by Mrs. Marcos with state money.
abstract: Conspiracy trial begins for Vilma Bautista, ex-aide to former first lady of the Philippines Imelda Marcos; Bautista is charged with illegally conspiring to sell four valuable paintings that were bought by Marcos with state money.
lead_paragraph: An ex-aide to Imelda Marcos, former first lady of the Philippines, is being tried for conspiring to sell valuable paintings that were bought by Mrs. Marcos with state money.

headline.main: Trial Opens for Imelda Marcos’s Ex-Aide
headline.print_headline: Trial Opens for Imelda Marcos’s Ex-Aide
